comments.html: I am excited about this. I see you've provided some details already, but, looking forward to more details :)
comments.name: Salman Naqvi

comments.html: As an oldtimer who is bringing himself back up to speed (which is why I found your site), I like this interactive process and look forward to participating in it.
comments.name: Unknown

comments.html: It would be great to see the full agenda and any security related topics, network management approaches (netflow, DPI in the next gen data center), cloud services integration (DDOS, cloud WAF, cloud proxy services?)
comments.name: Georgi
